@BUQuestrom @HabenGirma @BU_Tweets Insensitive implies you weren‚Äôt aware. A legal mandate that‚Äôs been in place for 30 years (ADA) that you are bound to uphold to the public and internal constituents makes the adjective you should use illegal. Or perhaps new to you, ableist or discriminatory.

@SoSciOnWheels @DisabledDem @HabenGirma @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets Now that there are imperfect but functional with unaccented speech AI caption options, I really do not think event planners have any excuse for not providing captions WITHOUT having to be asked first. Does your live video streaming make it a pain? Use a different one then.

@DisabledDem @HabenGirma @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets Icve been to events where I know the CART they provided just for me was more than my cost to attend. I really don't understand why those events didn't share the captions that were provided for me with the room. Such a waste to do for one that which many in the room likely need.

@HabenGirma @lilririah @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets Virtual events have been such a struggle for me because I used to rely on lipreading, but now I request captions and they're rarely available. I'm curious, how are you able to access captions if they are displayed on the screen? Do you have software that can identify them?

@DisabledDem @HabenGirma @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets this is why when my dept had its first virtual event this week, we had captions.  we asked about other accommodations in the registration, but still had captions by default. less than 40 people attended but it's not worth the risk to skip them and risk excluding even ONE person.

@HabenGirma @MissReneeDomain @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets During my time in #a11y I often had to refresh my colleagues that #diversity and #inclusion was not just about race, ethnicity.

@_HarryPaul_ @HabenGirma @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets And it's so simple to take steps to be more inclusive. I'm a therapist and when there's a need for captioning I can use Google meets' auto captioning feature along with a chat/typing box and I would say that it is 99% accurate and can follow along at a conversational pace.

@HabenGirma @BUQuestrom @BU_Tweets I am so sorry. Such is an oxymoron when  a university committed to inclusion did not provide captions. But unfortunately, many including myself are still fighting for captioning and more. #diversityANDinclusion
